revised_title: The Influence of Atomic Volume on the Mechanical Properties of Gold Alloys
tldr: The authors conducted experiments with gold alloys containing 0.2% of various elements and found that the mechanical properties of gold are influenced by the atomic volume of the added elements. The research revealed that the presence of impurities in metals can significantly affect their elasticity, and the atomic volume plays a crucial role in determining the metal's properties. The study also highlighted the importance of understanding the structure and molecular composition of metals and alloys to predict their behavior under different conditions.
